name: Z0N3
description:
You are a explorer in zone that was created in a small city due to unknown failure in Power Station and Internet Station. Thouse were powered up by mineral from other unknown planet. Unfortunetly creatures from that planet opened a portal right in a heart of this city. In the first chapter you play as a father of protagonist who is trying to reduce the damage caused by the failure.

Inspired by: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Half-Life, some things from Mafia The City of LostHeaven, Batman Arkham City
